entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then rain changing to snow mixed with rain near midnight and then changing to 30 percent chance of drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning and then to 40 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
